description technical detail:
ViewSonic CDP6530 65" Commercial LCD Display
ViewSonics CDP6530 Full HD commercial display is designed with 1920 x 1080p, 500-nit panel with 20,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio. Additional features include versatile inputs - HDMI, DVI, VGA, S-Video and composite, YPbPr (BNC) with built-in speakers and speaker output connections. The CDP6530 can be used to make up to a 5 x 5 display video wall applications and automatic scheduler. RS232 daisy chain and DDC/CI is also provided for remote control. VGA and composite video output is also provided for video loop through applications.
features: Dynamic Contrast, anti-glare coating, picture in picture (no tuner), hard coating, control panel lockout
service support details: Limited warranty - parts and labour - 3 years
